rank_none.en: {#server}» {#record}You must have {#highlite}{1}{#record} Local Records on this server before recieving a rank!
rank_none.de: {#server}» {#record}Du benötigst {#highlite}{1}{#record} lokale Rekorde, bevor du einen Rang auf diesem Server erhälst!

toprank.de: {#server}» {#record}Es gibt keinen der besser ist als du :-)

pb_none.en: {#server}» {#error}You don't have a Local Record on this map yet
pb_none.de: {#server}» {#error}Du hast bis jetzt keinen Rekord auf dieser Map

jukebox.en: {#server}» {#highlite}{1}{#emotic} was added to the jukebox by {#highlite}{2}

jukebox_already.en: {#server}» {#emotic}You already have a map in the jukebox! Wait till it's been played before adding another.
jukebox_already.de: {#server}» {#emotic}Du hast bereits eine Strecke in der Jukebox. Warte bis sie gespielt wurde, bevor du eine neue hinzufügst.

jukebox_dupl.en: {#server}» {#emotic}This map has already been added to the jukebox, pick another one.
jukebox_dupl.de: {#server}» {#emotic}Diese Map befindet sich bereits in der Jukebox.

jukebox_repeat.en: {#server}» {#emotic}This map has been played recently. Wait a while before adding it again.
jukebox_repeat.de: {#server}» {#emotic}Diese Map wurde kürzlich erst gespielt. Warte etwas, bis du sie wieder zu Jukebox hinzufügen kannst.

jukebox_next.en: {#server}» {#emotic}The next map will be {#highlite}{1}{#emotic} as requested by {#highlite}{2}

jukebox_nextenv.en: {#server}» {#emotic}The next map will be {#timelite}[{1}] {#highlite}{2}{#emotic} as requested by {#highlite}{3}

jukebox_skipleft.de: {#server}» {#emotic}Map {#highlite}{1}{#emotic} übersprungen weil {#highlite}{2}{#emotic} den Server verlassen hat

jukebox_drop.de: {#server}» {#emotic}{#highlite}{1}{#emotic} hat seine/ihre Map {#highlite}{2}{#emotic} aus der Jukebox entfernt!

jukebox_nodrop.en: {#server}» {#emotic}You don't have a map in the jukebox, use {#highlite}/elist{#emotic} to add one
jukebox_nodrop.de: {#server}» {#emotic}Du hast keine Map in der Jukebox. Benutze {#highlite}/elist{#emotic} um eine hinzuzufügen

jukebox_add.en: {#server}» {#highlite}{1}{#emotic} is requesting {#highlite}{2}{#emotic} from {3}.{br}{#emotic}This will require {#highlite}{4}{#emotic} votes to pass. Type {#highlite}/y{#emotic} to vote yes.
jukebox_add.de: {#server}» {#highlite}{1}{#emotic} fragt ob {#highlite}{2}{#emotic} von {3} hinzugefügt werden soll.{#emotic}{br}Das erfordert {#highlite}{4}{#emotic} Stimmen. Gebe {#highlite}/y{#emotic} um mit "Ja" zu stimmen.

jukebox_y.en: {#server}» {#highlite}{1}{#emotic} more votes needed to add {#highlite}{3}{#emotic}. Type {#highlite}/y{#emotic} to vote yes.
jukebox_y.de: {#server}» {#highlite}{1}{#emotic} mehr Stimmen benötigt zum hinzufügen von {#highlite}{3}{#emotic}. Gebe {#highlite}/y{#emotic} ein um mit "Ja" zu stimmen.

jukebox_pass.en: {#server}» {#emotic}Vote Passed! {#highlite}{1}{#emotic} has been added to the jukebox.

jukebox_notfound.en: {#server}» {#emotic}Map_ID not found - Type {#highlite}/list{#emotic} to see all maps.
jukebox_notfound.de: {#server}» {#emotic}Map_ID nicht gefunden - Gebe {#highlite}/list{#emotic} ein für eine Liste aller Maps.

jukebox_empty.en: {#server}» {#emotic}No maps in the jukebox, use {#highlite}/elist{#emotic} to add one
jukebox_empty.de: {#server}» {#emotic}Keine Maps in der Jukebox, benutze {#highlite}/elist{#emotic} um eine hinzuzufügen

jukebox_help.en: {#server}» {#emotic}You have to include a Map_ID, e.g {#highlite}/jukebox 12{#emotic} - Type {#highlite}/jukebox help{#emotic} for more info.
jukebox_help.de: {#server}» {#emotic}Du musst eine Map_ID, e.g {#highlite}/jukebox 12{#emotic} angeben - Benutze {#highlite}/jukebox help{#emotic} für mehr Informationen.

list_help.en: {#server}» {#emotic}Use {#highlite}/list{#emotic} first - Type {#highlite}/list help{#emotic} for more info.
list_help.de: {#server}» {#emotic}Benutze erst {#highlite}/list{#emotic} - Gebe {#highlite}/list help{#emotic} für mehr Informationen ein.

no_jukebox.en: {#server}» {#highlite}/jukebox{#emotic} is not currently enabled on this server.
no_jukebox.de: {#server}» {#highlite}/jukebox{#emotic} ist aktuell auf diesem Server nicht verfügbar.

add_present.en: {#server}» {#highlite}Map already in server list, not added.

no_add.en: {#server}» {#highlite}/add{#emotic} is not currently enabled on this server.

map_too_large.en: {#server}» {#error}Map is too large ({#highlite}{1}$i{#error} > {2} KB) - not added!
map_too_large.de: {#server}» {#error}Map ist zu groß ({#highlite}{1}$i{#error} > {2} KB) - nicht hinzugefügt!

vote_explain.en: {#server}» {#vote}CallVotes disabled - see {#highlite}/helpvote{#vote} for info on chat-based voting

vote_already.en: {#server}» {#error}A vote is already in progress. Wait for this to complete.
vote_already.de: {#server}» {#error}Es läuft bereits eine Abstimmung. Warte bis diese fertig ist.

vote_limit.en: {#server}» {#error}Already ran {#highlite}$i {1}{#error} {2} votes for this map - that's enough!
vote_limit.de: {#server}» {#error}Es sind bereits {#highlite}$i {1}{#error} {2} Abstimmungen für diese Map gelaufen - das ist genug!

vote_start.en: {#server}» {#highlite}{1}{#vote} is requesting to {#highlite}{2}{#vote}.{br}{#vote}This will require {#highlite}{3}{#vote} votes to pass. Type {#highlite}/y{#vote} to vote yes.

vote_y.en: {#server}» {#highlite}{1}{#vote} more vote{2} needed to {#highlite}{3}{#vote}. Type {#highlite}/y{#vote} to vote yes.

no_more_replay.en: {#server}» {#vote}No more than {#highlite}{1}{#vote} replays per map allowed!
no_more_replay.de: {#server}» {#vote}Nicht mehr als {#highlite}{1}{#vote} Wiederholungen einer Map erlaubt!

ask_admin.en: {#server}» {#error}Chat-based votes disabled - ask the currently available admin to

bootme_dialog.en: {#message}Thanks for playing, please come back soon!

ragequit.de: {#server}» {#highlite}{1}$z$s{#message} sagte: "@"#!" und hat völlig ausrastend den Server verlassen!

ragequit_dialog.en: {#message}Thanks for playing, please come back soon!
